price: ߣߌ߫ ߞߐߛߊߦߌ߲߫ ߢߊ߫ ߓߍ߫ ߊ߲ ߠߊ߫߸ ߊ߲ ߕߎ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
